@EnvAgency data shows @AnglianWater released RAW SEWAGE into the River Lark from the Fornham All Saints STW on 16 occasions for a total of 199 hours in 2020 and from the Great Welnetham STW on 15 occasions for a total of 239.75 hours. Let them know this is not acceptable!! https://t.co/YiCUH8RkG1

Well done to @StinkStopthe for mobilising people power today. Hundreds of local people attended the protest. The @EnvAgencyMids and @PHE_uk must listen and close down Walleys Quarry landfill and move to the restoration phase of the site now! https://t.co/khbLjmEs27

Irresistible.
Newly tarmacced cycle track and river defence.

The @EnvAgency #UK has contracted #Dutch dredging firm Van Oord to continue to protect the Lincolnshire coast for the next four years. Meeting the @EnvAgency zero #carbon goals, the dredger HAM316 will run on #sustainable  #biofuel. https://t.co/lo8hXcPkpS https://t.co/KGmaxiTk6h

Recycle Devon are supporting a new campaign from #CleanDevon to help prevent, detect and deter littering. Keep an eye out for the #FindABinOrTakeItHome campaign which is expected to run over the next few months. https://t.co/u2jThqRWyL
@liquid_highway1 @EnvAgency @EnvAgencySE What is the rationale?

Never seen a leech hatching? Now's your chance: an Amphibious leech (Trocheta subviridis) in River Lark upstream of #BuryStEdmunds. Among roving herd of Anabolia nervosa caddis fly larvae. Up to 20cm, it's 1 of only 3 large UK leech sp. #MySwim #Chalkstreams @Britnatureguide  1/5 https://t.co/UMMw2yYxO4

urls.description: ITV Central News: 'Crisis' in the water as soaring river phosphate levels threaten wildlife on the Wye

tweets.text: This ITV report is as shocking as yesterday’s news from the @EnvAgency . This is the death of an iconic river in slow motion - largely due to unmitigated agricultural pollution. The intensive poultry industry needs to clean itself up ASAP for starters @thenoblefoods https://t.co/d1pmbc1Fug

tweets.text:
Happy Easter from all of us at Preventing Plastic Pollution. Thanks to @EnvAgency for this lovely poster! Here are a few simple things you can do this bank holiday weekend to help us tackle plastic pollution: https://t.co/nOhTvzaOoO 

🇬🇧🐣#plasticfree #getcreative 🐣🇪🇺 https://t.co/AOfIzW3ojV

tweets.text:
How many face coverings did you see littered on your last beach walk?

Litter spoils the places we enjoy and can make its way into the sea and possibly harm marine life.

Bring a bag for your #litter when you go outdoors and take it home to dispose of.

#BinIt4Beaches https://t.co/5XocwdLO82

This week we spent the day with 
@moorsforfuture @NT_TheNorth on Holcombe Moor, #Bury to show @ThatsManchester this #nfm site

The project which is part of the £40m Radcliffe & Redvales Scheme, uses stone & peat dams to restrict the flow of #flood water

👉https://t.co/FhGtbCYpnm https://t.co/0uI3aPUgPP
